trans-unit.target: 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>就會引發事件，以繼續作業而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>會在螢幕座標中，工作區座標。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to convert the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>屬性，以用戶端<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item and the mouse pointer is no longer over the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者拖曳項目並且滑鼠指標不再停留於這個項目的工作區上時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>使用者拖曳出控制項的資料指標，或使用者取消目前的拖放作業時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下列的 < 備註 > 會說明如何及何時會引發與拖放作業相關的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的項目。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 接著會檢查此項目是否為有效的置放目標。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是有效的置放目標，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>指定的拖放效果引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 以下列方式會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、 鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態變更：

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠進入另一個項目，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>針對該控制項就會引發。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的項目內便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>就會引發事件，以繼續作業而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item over the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者將項目拖過這個項目的工作區時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>滑鼠游標拖放作業期間移動控制項的範圍內時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the parent control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.EnabledChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.EnabledChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引發這個事件使用特定的屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目顯示之文字字型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 所顯示的文字所要套用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Font%2A> property to get or set the font that will be used by default for painting and text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Font%2A>繪製和文字中的預設將使用屬性來取得或設定字型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此項目的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the item.
trans-unit.target: 此項目的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A> property for custom rendering.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A>自訂轉譯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A>屬性變更時以程式設計方式修改或透過互動。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引發這個事件使用特定的屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />，其為目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的容器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />，其為目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> is a read-only accessor to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> 是唯讀的存取子，來<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A parent differs from an owner in that a parent denotes the returned current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in which the item is displayed, which might be in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: 父代與擁有者的父代表示傳回的目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>項目顯示，這可能會溢位區域。

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的自訂大小區域。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fit.
trans-unit.target: 擷取能夠容納控制項的矩形區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> ordered pair, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 的排序配對，表示矩形的寬度和高度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於拖曳作業時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>拖放作業開始時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件允許拖曳事件修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的來源。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下列的 < 備註 > 會說明如何及何時會引發與拖放作業相關的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的項目。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 接著會檢查此項目是否為有效的置放目標。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是有效的置放目標，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>指定的拖放效果引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 以下列方式會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、 鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態變更：

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠進入另一個項目，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>針對該控制項就會引發。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的項目內便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>就會引發事件，以繼續作業而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示以像素為單位的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>設定和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（預設值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，都沒有映像，也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>調整，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A> properties for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> ，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the image on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上影像的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> property to get or set image alignment on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>屬性來取得或設定影像對齊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A> property to get or set text alignment on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A>屬性來取得或設定文字對齊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>設定和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（預設值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，都沒有映像，也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>調整，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A> properties for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> ，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index value of the image that is displayed on the item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此項目上顯示的影像索引值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the image in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList" /> that is displayed for the item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList" /> 中為項目顯示之影像的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, signifying that the image list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示影像清單是空的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> property specifies the position of the image in the image list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>屬性會指定影像的位置清單中的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> property specifies the image itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>屬性會指定影像本身。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates some or all of the surface of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 讓 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的部分或整個介面失效，並重新繪製它。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the entire surface of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 讓 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的整個介面失效，並重新繪製它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> method for custom rendering.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A>自訂轉譯的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示要使其失效的區域。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> by adding it to the update region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />, which is the area that will be repainted at the next paint operation, and causes a paint message to be sent to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的指定區域加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的更新區域的方式使指定區域失效 (更新區域會在下一次繪製作業中重新繪製)，並使繪製訊息傳送至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出物件是否已經處置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has been disposed of; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已經處置，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的字元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 判斷字元是否為此項目所能識別的輸入字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元應直接傳送至這個項目而不前置處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 在視窗訊息來判斷是否應該前置處理過或直接寄給指定的輸入的字元前置處理期間呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法會傳回`true`，指定的字元直接寄給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果該方法會傳回`false`，字元會前置處理，並只傳送給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>如果它不由前置處理階段。

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否另一個控制項的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: For all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: the <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />值 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> or a special key (such as PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, ENTER, ESC, TAB, or arrow keys) that should be preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法來判斷是否指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵，應直接傳送的視窗訊息前置處理期間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>或特殊索引鍵 （例如 PAGE UP、 PAGE DOWN、 ENTER、 esc 鍵、 索引標籤上，鍵或方向鍵），應該前置處理。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, the key is sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 在後者的情況下，金鑰會傳送至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>只有當它不由前置處理階段。

trans-unit.source: For all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: the <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />值 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 的容器是否為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 的容器為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.IsOnDropDown%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> 屬性是否設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is updated.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的位置更新時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is updated by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>會更新以程式設計方式修改或透過互動。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引發這個事件使用特定的屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between the item and adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此項目和相鄰項目之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the space between the item and adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，表示此項目和相鄰項目之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how child menus are merged with parent menus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定子功能表要如何與父功能表合併的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction.MatchOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction.MatchOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of a merged item within the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中已合併項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the index of the merged item, if a match is found, or -1 if a match is not found.
trans-unit.target: 整數，如有找到相符項目，表示已合併項目的索引；如果找不到相符項目，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A> property to get or set the index of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> so that you can access it for menu-merging operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A>屬性來取得或設定索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>，讓您可以存取它的功能表合併作業。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A> property to insert a merged <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> in a specific location.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A>屬性，即可插入合併<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>中特定位置。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseMove> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseMove>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseMove> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripItem1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseMove>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the item and a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標位於此項目上方，並放開滑鼠按鍵時。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseHover> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseHover> 或 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name.
trans-unit.target: 表示名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property can be used as a key into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>屬性可以用做為索引鍵到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the AvailableChanged event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 AvailableChanged 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnAvailableChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnAvailableChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnAvailableChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnAvailableChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnAvailableChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnAvailableChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnTextChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnTextChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnTextChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnTextChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.VisibleChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.VisibleChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnVisibleChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnVisibleChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the item is attached to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" /> or can float between the two.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此項目是否附加至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" />，或是可以在這兩者之間浮動的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.AsNeeded" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.AsNeeded" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property in stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>中堆疊配置的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In flow and table layouts, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and therefore the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 流程和表格配置中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>溢位按鈕時，不會轉譯，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A> properties, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A>屬性，以及控制代碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `movingToolStrip` and call `InitializeMovingToolStrip` in the form's constructor or `Load` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名為`movingToolStrip`呼叫`InitializeMovingToolStrip`表單的建構函式中或`Load`事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the owner of this item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此項目的擁有人。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that owns or is to own the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />，擁有或即將擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> whose Items collection contains the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> 傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>的項目集合會包含目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: This is the best way to reference <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> or other properties in the top-level <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> without writing special code to handle overflow.
trans-unit.target: 這是最佳的方式來參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>或其他內容，在最上層<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>而不需要撰寫特殊的程式碼來處理溢位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> remains the same even if the item falls into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A>維持不變，即使項目可分為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> can be `null` for certain elements that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> collection but not in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A>可以`null`某些項目在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>集合中使用，但是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A>自訂轉譯的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引發這個事件使用特定的屬性設定。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。
